snippet: Algeria's ENTV news channel interviewed a number of local and foreign workers who had been held captive in a gas facility and were freed on Friday, with some of them expressing relief.
abstract: Algeria's ENTV news channel interviewed a number of local and foreign workers who had been held captive in a gas facility and were freed on Friday, with some of them expressing relief.

byline.original: By CHRISTINE HAUSER and LIAM STACK

headline.main: Algerian TV Interviews Workers Freed From Gas Facility
